name: ASAuthorizationPublicKeyCredentialParameters
desc: An object that provides required parameters for the credential during registration.

items.name: init(algorithm: ASCOSEAlgorithmIdentifier)
items.desc: Creates the object with an algorithm.

items.name: var algorithm: ASCOSEAlgorithmIdentifier
items.desc: The algorithm to use for negitation between the authenticator and the relying party.
